alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 5:18PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense band of snow showers will affect east central Ashtabula...Erie and Crawford Counties Until 630 PM EDT.... At 515 PM EDT, radar indicated an intense band of snow showers along a line extending from Erie to 9 miles northwest of Andover, moving east at 25 mph. These snow showers have a history of leading to accidents along I-90 in Northeast Ohio. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Winds to 30 mph... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Sudden changes in road conditions... Locations impacted include... Erie, Meadville, Conneaut, Corry, Edinboro, North East, Union City, Girard, Cambridge Springs, Waterford, Albion, Linesville, Wattsburg, Canadohta Lake, Pymatuning Central, Riceville, Harmonsburg, Northwest Harborcreek, Lincolnville and Guys Mills. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. &&
